channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.3.3 Released
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-3-3-released/index.html#comment-55846">T.Schumann</a>.
I'm afraid that I haven't had chance to test with copssh. I'd suggest <a href="http://bugs.mysql.com/" title="MySQL bug database" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">raising a bug</a>.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to T.Schumann.

I’m afraid that I haven’t had chance to test with copssh. I’d suggest raising a bug.

item.title: By: T.Schumann
item.dc:creator: T.Schumann
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-3-3-released/index.html#comment-51126">andrew</a>.
Hello Andrew, now i have installed copssh server. i have acces form the install Pc to the clients via putty, but not from the auto_installer. What is wrong?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to andrew.

Hello Andrew,
now i have installed copssh server. i have acces form the install Pc to the clients via putty, but not from the auto_installer. What is wrong?

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-3-3-released/index.html#comment-51075">T.Schumann</a>.
For a Windows ssh client I use Putty. If you also need a Windows ssh server then you can try FreeSSHd.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to T.Schumann.

For a Windows ssh client I use Putty. If you also need a Windows ssh server then you can try FreeSSHd.

Andrew.

item.title: By: T.Schumann
item.dc:creator: T.Schumann
item.description: Hello Andrew,I do not have much experience with the MySQL Cluster. But we have one with version 7.2 in use and some big problems with this. I would like to update to the latest version. In addition I have downloaded the version 7.3.3. But I do not get this installed with the autoinstaller. It failing again and again with the connection to the other computer. It is to be established an SSH channel, but what do you use? Mysql is to be built on a Windows7 system. What SSH client can I take it? I urgently your need help.
item.content:encoded: Hello Andrew,I do not have much experience with the MySQL Cluster. But we have one with version 7.2 in use and some big problems with this. I would like to update to the latest version. In addition I have downloaded the version 7.3.3. But I do not get this installed with the autoinstaller. It failing again and again with the connection to the other computer. It is to be established an SSH channel, but what do you use? Mysql is to be built on a Windows7 system. What SSH client can I take it? I urgently your need help.
